attributes.action: stop using the word "ABSURD" in answer to difficult questions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when difficult and serious questions have been asked over the past ten years, our PM  Mr Blair has consistently replied "that's ABSURD" and left the questions unanswered. This is not good enough. We the undersigned call on our other PM Mr Brown to not use this word ever again and to answer questions in a direct manner, truthfully and clearly.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
